title: AIIMS Patna
description: AIIMS Patna, a pioneer autonomous medical institution, serving people in healthcare, research and training. It works under the motto of 'May no one suffer from illness'.
cleaned_text: What's New From the All India Institute of Medical Sciences Patna, a hearty welcome! An Act of Parliament established the All India Institute of Medical Sciences as a national institution with the goal of developing a medical workforce to demonstrate a high standard of Medical Education and sophisticated health care at an affordable cost in India. The Patna Institute is growing not only as an excellent "Centre of Learning," but also as a provider of high-quality healthcare services. The Institute's primary goals and my personal priorities are as follows: Total OPD Footfall Total Laboratory Test Total IPD Admission Total Trauma & Emergency
